title: kaTTi aNaindiTTa
sahitya:
kaTTi aNaindiTTa kandanaip-pirindip-pO eTTu nAL AccudaDi sakhiyE ennai anru


anupallavi

  viTTup-pOghaiyil en vEdanai tIra ArudalAi taTTik-kaimEl AnaiyiTTuttAn pOnAnaDi


caraNam 1    ovvOr nALaiyum nAn ovvOr yugam pOlavE evvidhamO iduvarai EkkamODu pOkkinEn
ivvidamAgha Engum EzhaipAl koncamum irangAdavan nenjam irumbaiyum minjudaDi
    caraNam 2    pinnum avan ingE shonnapaDi varAviDil tannam tanimaiyilE tavittut-tuDippEnaDi
vanna mayil mIdil avan punnakaip-polivuDanE vandiDa vENum enru en cintai Ashai koLLudaDi
